---
title: "Wedding of Genres"
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(htmltools)

opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE)

# Convenience functions
top_level_image <- function(img_name, img_title) {
    as.character(img(
        src = paste0('img/', img_name),
        title = img_title,
        width = '640px'
    ))
}
```

`r top_level_image('bookring.jpg', 'As from a fairytale')`

On the seventh of October, 2017, your witness is requested for the marriage of

```{block, type='fancy'}
Nathaniel James Werth

&

Lacey Jane Shupp
```
